Key Match Events: Scotland reached 90-0 off 10 overs before game halted
George Munsey scored 41 runs and Michael Jones scored 45 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Small but lively crowd had pitched up for this 10.30am start
Children from Jofra Archerâ€™s old school, Christ Church Foundation, among them
Sir Garfield Sobers was looking on from a wicker chair at the top of the Worrell, Weekes and Walcott Stand
Others: Match abandoned after downpours in Barbados
England will need to be far sharper against Australia on Saturday than was witnessed here
This time it was Munsey who put his foot down
But as Scotland went through some warm-ups on the outfield during the change of innings, a third and final deluge saw the return of the dreaded covers and pushed things past the 2.52pm cut off point
